resources.string: When the app opens, it will automatically search for nearby events.
You can place a marker by tapping on the screen,and the app will then search fro events around that marker.
You can filter by date by clicking the top right menu button, then selecting filter
Select a marker to view the venue name and the event name. Tapping on the info window will then show you more event details
Here you can see more of the event details
